name: Orc
description: Orcs are robust humanoids with powerful builds and thick skin with unique regenerative properties. They often display prominent tusks and sharp features, but much of the aggression that used to dictate them has long since been redirected to bustling industry. Orcs are relatively peaceful and eager to trade with the rest of the Viridus Nexus, but their long feud with the Elves who share the same moon has caused them to be reserved and ready to defend themselves.

options.name: Medium
options.description: Orcs are medium sized creatures and suffer no penalty or benefits.

options.name: Orcish Endurance
options.description: Orcs have evolved beyond their brutal past, but their bodies remain remarkably resilient. Gain +1 skill with resilience and heal 1 extra health per full rest.

options.name: Daily Action : Endure
options.description: You attempt to shake off any bleeding, poisons, or other harmful substances in your body by rolling an endurance check. On a 6 or higher, you are successfully cleansed. On an 11 or higher, you also gain 5 morale if a condition was removed.

options.name: Innate Rage
options.description: The fury of your ancestors still burns in your blood, erupting under moments of stress or uncertainty. When you become confused, you become maddened instead.
